Package controller

Class ProcessDocumentServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • controller.ProcessDocumentServlet

  • @WebServlet("/myProcessDocumentServlet")
public class ProcessDocumentServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Main class of the servlet displaying current time, date and image. Site generated by servlet is refreshed every 10 seconds.
    Since:
    4.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Piotr Gazda
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • createDocumentOutput

        private java.lang.String createDocumentOutput​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> myDocument)
        Method for converting list of strings into a single string which can be displayed in a HTML form. It assumes the strings already have appropriate newline character.
        Parameters:
        myDocument - List of strings to be merged.
        Returns:
        Created string.

      • createDocumentOutputWithNewline

        private java.lang.String createDocumentOutputWithNewline​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> myDocument)
        Method for converting list of strings into a single string which can be displayed in a HTML form. It assumes the strings don't have appropriate newline character.
        Parameters:
        myDocument - List of strings to be merged.
        Returns:
        Created string.

      • processInputWhenFilename

        private java.lang.String processInputWhenFilename​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                  javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp)
                                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                  EmptyFileException
        Method for reading document contents from stream provided by GET method. It enables processing file from client computer to which absolute path has been given. It checks which decision button has been pressed and performs appropriate processing.
        Parameters:
        request - servlet request
        resp - servlet response
        Returns:
        String containing processed HTML document.
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if a servlet-specific error occurs
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        EmptyFileException

                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                javax.servlet.ServletException,
                                                EmptyFileException
        Method for reading document contents from stream provided by POST method. It enables uploading files to server. It checks which decision button has been pressed and performs appropriate processing.
        Parameters:
        request - servlet request
        resp - servlet response
        Returns:
        String containing processed HTML document.
        Throws:

        public void processRequest​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                           javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                    throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Method for processing request for analyzing HTML document. It chooses the right way of obtaining input data depending on method used to send request.
        Parameters:
        request - servlet request
        response - servlet response
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException - if a servlet-specific error occurs
